languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, позвольте еще секунду вашего внимания. Прошу, примите от нас, простых жителей отсека, этот скромный подарок — за все добро, что вы нам делаете. Самое ценное, что смогли достать для Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, позвольте еще секунду вашего внимания. Прошу, примите от нас, простых жителей отсека, этот скромный подарок — за все добро, что вы нам делаете. Самое ценное, что смогли достать для Вашей Светлости".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, позвольте еще секунду вашего внимания. Прошу, примите от нас, простых жителей отсека, этот скромный подарок — за все добро, что вы нам делаете. Самое ценное, что смогли достать для Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Before you can turn around, a dirty-faced young man squeezes his way out of the crowd.{/n} "Lord Captain! All of us here, well, we've put together a little gift for you. For all the good you do for our sakes. We really mean it, so please don't scoff. Them's the most valuable things we could scrounge up for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

For all the good you do for our sakes. We really mean it, so please don't scoff. Them's the most valuable things we could scrounge up for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Before you can turn around, a dirty-faced young man squeezes his way out of the crowd.{/n} "Lord Captain! All of us here, well, we've put together a little gift for you. For all the good you do for our sakes. We really mean it, so please don't scoff. Them's the most valuable things we could scrounge up for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, dürfte ich noch einmal um Eure Aufmerksamkeit bitten? Bitte akzeptiert dieses bescheidene Geschenk von uns, den einfachen Leuten der Bucht, für alles, was Ihr für uns getan habt. Das ist das Wertvollste, was wir für Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} auftreiben konnten."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, dürfte ich noch einmal um Eure Aufmerksamkeit bitten? Bitte akzeptiert dieses bescheidene Geschenk von uns, den einfachen Leuten der Bucht, für alles, was Ihr für uns getan habt. Das ist das Wertvollste, was wir für Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} auftreiben konnten."

languages.text: « Si vous voulez bien m'accorder encore un petit instant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, j'aimerais vous offrir ce modeste présent de notre part à tous, nous, les humbles travailleurs de cette baie. C'est ce qu'on a pu trouver de plus précieux pour vous remercier de votre sollicitude envers nous, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous voulez bien m'accorder encore un petit instant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, j'aimerais vous offrir ce modeste présent de notre part à tous, nous, les humbles travailleurs de cette baie. C'est ce qu'on a pu trouver de plus précieux pour vous remercier de votre sollicitude envers nous, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, le ruego un segundo más de su atención. Por favor, acepte este humilde obsequio en nombre de los plebeyos del compartimento, para agradecerle lo bien que se ha portado con nosotros. Es lo más valioso que hemos podido reunir para usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, le ruego un segundo más de su atención. Por favor, acepte este humilde obsequio en nombre de los plebeyos del compartimento, para agradecerle lo bien que se ha portado con nosotros. Es lo más valioso que hemos podido reunir para usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！少しだけお時間をください！どうか、このささやかな贈り物を受け取ってください。このベイにいる平民たちが、俺たちのためにしてくださったことへの感謝の印です。これが俺たちが陛下のためにかき集めた中で、一番貴重なものなんです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！少しだけお時間をください！どうか、このささやかな贈り物を受け取ってください。このベイにいる平民たちが、俺たちのためにしてくださったことへの感謝の印です。これが俺たちが陛下のためにかき集めた中で、一番貴重なものなんです」

languages.text: “舰长大人，我请求您再听我说几句。请收下我们为您准备的这份薄利，感谢您为我们所做的一切。这已经是我们能找到的最有价值的东西了，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我请求您再听我说几句。请收下我们为您准备的这份薄利，感谢您为我们所做的一切。这已经是我们能找到的最有价值的东西了，大人。”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bir kez daha dikkatinizi rica edeceğim. Bizim için yaptığınız tüm iyilikler adına bizlerden, bölmenin yurttaşlarından gelen bu mütevazı hediyeyi lütfen kabul edin. Bu, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri için bulabildiğimiz en kıymetli şeydir."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I beg another second of your attention. Please accept this humble gift from us, the common people of the bay, for all the good you do us. The most precious thing we could get for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
